Reformed smokers support measures NZ Govt dropped, new research reveals https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-research-reveals-support-among-reformed-smokers-for-measures-that-govt-dropped/3OYVV7DKFFAY3OCAH5AMVQ27WQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-research-reveals-support-among-reformed-smokers-for-measures-that-govt-dropped/3OYVV7DKFFAY3OCAH5AMVQ27WQ/ Jamie MortonStudy finds overwhelming backing for ‘smokefree generation’ and non-addictive cigarettes. Thu, 23 Jan 2025 16:00:00 +0000 In a just-published study, nearly 83% of almost 2000 smokers – or newly reformed ones – told University of Otago researchers they backed banning the sale of tobacco products to people born after a certain date to create a “smokefree generation”.
